string.text: The nature of this medusa-like vermin jumping out of the ground is not investigated. By contact injures like strong acid \nburn. It generates such artifacts as "af-ameba-slime", "af-ameba-slug", af-ameba-mica"

This anomaly was found one of the first in the Zone in 2008. It delivers a blow with its gravity force like air-blast by 
explosion. She resides in the same place average once a week. During its life time it changes force of effect, which varies 
from bruise to instant death "launching body on the orbit". It can be recognized by distorted air above it, whirling leaves 
and typical red-drown spots; these are places of loser's and stupid novice's starts. Can be well discovered by all kind of 
detectors and by throwing different metal things into it. Randomly generates tree kind of artifacts "Medusa" "Crystal Flower" 
and "Night star"

This anomalous formation accumulates static electricity in some area in radius of 40 feet. Disturbed anomaly explodes 
with dozen of lightning. Electric shock almost always is fatal. Typical feature of this anomaly is visible bluish mist over it. It 
can be well disclosed by any kind of detectors, and by throwing different metal things into it. Randomly generates such 
artifacts as "Electra", "Electra flesh" or "Electra moon light".
It's anomaly vegetation. By approaching it egests cloud of particles which injures human like stinging sell. It generates \ntree \ntypes of seed-artifacts: "Thorn", "Kristal thorn", "Sea urchin".

This an anomaly of gravity nature. It's like little black hole. It absorbs with enormous strength everything appeared in radius 
of 30-40 feet into its center. It's very important not to miss the beginning of absorption and don't get into the zone of 
maximum effect. In this case you won't get only bruises- this anomaly is always fatal dangerous. The anomaly squeezes a body 
in some clod, breaks ones bones and after accumulating some critical mass, in moment of nucleus discharge, tears this body 
apart. In this moment anomaly throws about products of compression, forming new artifacts. During its life time this 
anomaly doesn't change location and slightly alternates power of effect. It resides on one place ca. one week. One can reduce 
its influence carrying on the belt such artifacts as УMedusaФ, УCrystal flowerФ and УNight starФ Can be recognized by seeing 
distorted air above it, whirling leaves, dismembered animal corpses and typical dark spot in the center on the ground. This 
anomaly can be disclosed only by special detectors, or by throwing any metal things into it. It usually generates tree types of 
artifacts УVyvertФ, УGravityФ and УGolden fishФ.

It is harmless anomaly. It allows for some time to forget about terrestrial gravity. In some local place of several feet \nterrestrial gravity greatly decreases. Constant drifting in it allows getting out. The only unfavorable moment is that, you can \nbe easily shot by opponents. It generates УDummy pellicleФ artifact.

The funny name of this anomaly is determined by its effect. When any living being got into it the anomaly lift it up, rotate 
and tears out all extremities. It is extremely dangerous. The nature of this vortex like anomaly isn't clear yet. It can be 
recognized by noticing light dust vortex and body members of animals and people around it. It's very important not to miss 
the beginning of absorption and don't get into the zone of maximum effect. It usually generates tree types of artifacts 
УMincer bloodФ, УMincer MeatloafФ and УMincer soulФ. All of the artifacts of this over-nature killing mincer mystically 
influence human vital forces.
It is the area of high radiation level. It usually higher then 50mR/h. Mostly they are shown on maps. The only advice is to \navoid long presence in it.\n
Mutations of these plants led to the appearance of these liana-like spiny plants. By approaching injures.

This anomaly surely can be called a miracle. In the radius of several feet the time is slowing down. It doesn't effect the 
health but you spend a lot of time to get out from there. You can also smart lure enemies into it and give a flight to your 
imagination. Usually in the center there is an spiral-like artifact "Dummy-glassbeads". You can deactivate this anomaly by 
means of it. Subsequently this temporal mine can be very useful.

It is slightly visible in inert condition cloud of hot air. By getting any living being into it, it arises a compact burning zone 
with the temperature of 1500k. Everything within УZharkaФ instantly burns, and mostly dies. The danger of this anomaly is 
because of it constant motion by random routes. The positive moment is it disclosures of other anomalies so you can follow it 
without surprise. This anomaly can be disclosed only by special detectors, or by throwing any metal things into it. It generates 
such artifacts as УZharka dropsФ, УZharka fire ballФ and УZharka crystalФ.

It is an artifact produced by "Kholodets" anomaly. It is semi transparent jelly-like formation. this artifact can instantly 
satiate any person, who puts it on his belt. Moreover it almost in a trice absorbs all radiation out of a bearer and 
immediately stops bleedings. As side effect can be noticed reinforcement of the fire, electricity and chemical damages. 
The price is high. Scientific organizations show interest in it.

It is an artifact produced by "Kholodets" anomaly. It is semi transparent jelly-like formation. 
This artifact mysticaly satiate any organism with nutrition elements at the same time reinforcing common, fire, electricity and 
chemical burns. 
It is also promotes blood coagulation. Moreover it absorbs all radiation bit by bit out of a bearer's organism. 
The price isn't high. Scientific organizations show interest in it.

It is an artifact produced by "Kholodets" anomaly. It is semi transparent jelly-like formation. 
This artifact mysticaly satiate any organism with nutrition elements at the same time reinforcing common, fire, electricity and 
chemical burns. 
It is also effects any wounds spopping the bleeding. Moreover it absorbs all radiation out of a bearer's organism. 
The price is medium. Scientific organizations show interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by УMarry go roundФ anomaly. It is ugly reddish formation of compressed polymerized fairy curved 
rests of plants soil and bones. By carrying it on the belt mystically fastens wounds healing, and stops bleeding. Stalkers 
believe 
this artifact contains the power of deceased in this anomaly people. During the healing human's flesh becomes soft and 
temporarily becomes open to injury. Furthermore healing requires a lot of nutritious substance it makes you hungry. The price 
isn't high because of its wide expansion. Scientific organizations first of all medics and different religious cults show interest 
in 
it.

Its name accurate describes its appearance. It is a big glancing reddish crystal. Stalkers say it can stop any bleedings, at \nthat making a person hungry and exhausted. Moreover it makes a bearer tolerant to fire but very open for chemical burns. \nThe price is high. The probability of appearance is low. Scientific organizations show interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by УSpring boardФ anomaly. It's a beautiful formation with glancing surface containing impregnation. 
It is compressed fairy curved rests of plants and everything that appears in the direct zone of effect of anomaly. By wearing 
on one's belt it increases bullet-proof effect. It is radioactive. The price and likelihood of appearance is average. Scientific 
organizations, collectors and jewelers show interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by УZharkaФ anomaly. It's drop-alike formation with choppy glanced surface. Stalkers say it stops \nbleedings, at that making a person hungry and exhausted. Moreover it provides a bearer with some tolerance to fire but \nopen for chemical burns. It decreases endurance. The price isn't high. Collectors and jewelers show interest in it.

The origin of this artifact is unknown. It is a finned shining formation. Very useful artifact for its bearer. It maintain \nbearer springtly and active taking away fatique and hunger. It protects agaist electric discharge. The price is very \nhigh. Scientific organization show interest in it.

The origin of this artifact is unknown. It looks like two hard discs fastened together with slime. Protects a bearer in a close 
combat against bullet reducing damages. The price is
high. Scientific organization show interest in it.

Very rare artifact of unknown origin. It looks like fancy curved spiral sown with shining perl-drops. Reduces hunger and \nnourishes the orgfanism. Every person who carry it on his belt can dispense without food and water endless long time. \nThe artifact reinforces the radiation effect on the human organism. Everybody show interest in it.

Rare artifact of unknown origin. Superfine pellicle of the glass-alike substance with unusual refracting properties. It is \nradioactive. It protects against chemical affection and makes bearer more enduring.The price is high. Scientific \norganization, collectors, jewelers and show business.

The origin of this artifact is unknown. It looks like two hard discs fastened together with slime. Protects a bearer in a close 
combat against bullet reducing damages. It also decreases damage effect delivered by gravitation natured anomalies. 
The price is very high. Scientific organization show interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by УElectraФ anomaly. It is semi-transparent amorphous sparkling formation, shining from within \nwith small rays of light. It slightly increases endurance and gives some tolerance to the electricity. Besides it reinforced a little \nbit radiation effect on organism. The price is average. Scientific organizations, collectors and jewelers show interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by УElectraФ anomaly. It is semi-transparent amorphous sparkling formation, with shining core. It 
greatly increases endurance, and invulnerable to electric discharge. Besides it reinforced a little 
bit radiation effect on organism. As a result even weak radioactive anomaly turns very dangerous. The price is high. It is 
radioactive. Scientific organizations, collectors and jewelers show interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by УElectraФ anomaly. It is semi-transparent amorphous sparkling formation. It slightly increases 
endurance and gives some tolerance to the electricity. Besides it reinforced a little 
bit radiation effect on organism. The price isn't high. Scientific organizations, collectors and jewelers 
show interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by УZharkaФ anomaly. Its semi-transparent reddish ball shaped formation.Stalkers say it can stop \nany bleedings, at that making a person hungry and exhausted. Besides it grants to the bearer fire tolerance at that making \nopen to chemical burns. The price is average. Collectors and jewelers show interest in it.

It is rare artifact of unknown origin. It looks like a ball orange size hard and warm by touch. By carring on the belt it gives \nhuman ultranatural tolerance to fire and electricity. However side effect a bit reinforced radiation influence on organism. \nThe price is high. Scientific organization first of all medics show interest in it.

It is an artifact rarely formed by УWhirlpoolФ anomaly. It's a beautiful formation with glancing surface. It is compressed fairy 
curved rests of plants and everything that appears in the direct zone of anomaly discharge. By wearing on one's belt it 
dicreases harm of animal bites and hits. It is very radioactive. The price is very high. The likelihood of appearance is low. 
Scientific organizations, collectors and jewelers show interest in it.

It is a beautiful artifact formed by УWhirlpoolФ anomaly. It is compressed fairy curved rests of plants and everything that 
appears in the direct zone of effect of anomaly. By wearing on one's belt it dicreases the harm of pokes, hits and bites. It is 
radioactive. The price and likelihood of appearance is average. Scientific organizations, collectors and jewelers show interest 
in it.

It is an artifact formed by УSpring boardФ anomaly. It is compressed fairy curved rests of plants and everything that appears \nin the direct zone of effect of anomaly. It provides minor bullet-proof effect, decreasing the damage degree. It is radioactive. \nThe price isn't high because of its wide expansion. Scientific organizations show interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by УMarry go roundФ anomaly. It is ugly yellowish formation of compressed polymerized fairy 
curved rests of plants soil and bones. By carrying it on the belt mystically greatly fastens wounds healing, and stops 
bleeding. Stalkers believe this artifact contains the power of deceased in this anomaly people. During the healing human's 
flesh becomes soft and temporarily becomes open to injury. Furthermore healing requires a lot of nutritious substance it 
makes you hungry. It is radioactive. The price and likelihood of appearance is average. Scientific organizations first of all 
medics and different religious cults show interest in it.

It is an artifact rarely formed by УSpring boardФ anomaly. It's a beautiful formation with glancing surface and color 
phosphoric impregnations. At night illuminates everything all around in radius ca 3-6 feet. It is compressed fairy curved rests 
of plants and everything that appears in the direct zone of effect of anomaly. By wearing on one's belt it works like strong 
protective field that decreased shooting weapon damage. It is very radioactive. The price is high. The likelihood of 
appearance is low. Scientific organizations and militants show interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by "rusty hair" anomaly. It is a crystal of foggy dull stone covered with crack. By carrying on the 
belt it purifies the organism of radiation. Hunger reinforcement is side effect. During usage of this artifact it can happen 
nose and mouth bleeding. It also increases protection against chemical burns and radiation, at that making open to fire 
and electricity. The price is average. Scientific organisations, collectors and jewelers show interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by "rusty hair" anomaly. It is light-weighted gray sphere, dense covered with not sharp thorns. By 
carrying on the belt it almost instantly purifies the organism of radiation but mekes to feel great hunger. During usage of 
this artifact it can happen bleeding all over the body. It also makes its bearer almost invulnarable chemical burns and 
radiation, at that making open to fire and electricity. The price is high. Scientific organisations, collectors and jewelers show 
interest in it.

It is an artifact formed by "rusty hair" anomaly. It is a piece of rust ball shaped with needles around. It is calm by touch. 
By carrying on the belt it slowly but surely purifies the organism of radiation. Hunger reinforcement is side effect. During 
usage of this artifact it is probabgility of nose and mouth bleeding. It also increases protection against chemical burns 
and radiation, at that making open to fire and electricity. The price is low. Scientific organisations, collectors and jewelers 
show interest in it.

It is rare artifact formed by УMarry go roundФ anomaly. It is ugly red-yellowish formation of compressed polymerized fairy 
curved rests of plants soil and bones. By carrying it on the belt mystically in several seconds recovers human's health, and 
stops any kind of bleedings. Stalkers believe this artifact contains souls of deceased in this anomaly people. At the same time 
the body of a bearer becomes open to injuries and requieres a lot of nourishing substance. It is radioactive. The price is very 
high. The likelihood of appearance is low. Scientific organizations first of all medics and different religious cults show interest 
in it.

It is an artifact formed by УWhirlpoolФ anomaly. It is compressed fairy curved rests of plants and everything that appears in \nthe direct zone of effect of anomaly. By wearing on one's belt it slightly reduces harm of pokes, hits and bites. It is \nradioactive. The price isn't high because of its wide expansion. Scientific organizations show interest in it.

It is strange place. If you move deep down you appear on a radioactive valley and find a little rusty lake. The whole lake 
is filled with cars remains - it is a big pile of a rusty trash slightly covered with water. You can also find an old institute and 
a factory it became overgrown with some mutated vermin. Besides, militants appear very often there recently. It is 
something interested for them in this insitute.

Grouping "Duty" cleared a place on the outskirts of "Rostok" plant, for own base and for brother stalker can have a rest. 
It is so to speak oasis in the desert. There are neither anomalies nor monsters. At the local cafe you find stalker bar. 
Here gather stalkers from the whole Zone. Local trader is a bartender there, one might say he keeps this facility. Go 
there if you want to trade, communicate and get some interesting mission. Well, fresh news you also get there. By the 
way there is a military base to the North, and a dump to the South.

This is the dark valley, it is always darkly and foggy. It rains often. You can find good artifacts there and you can also 
easy kiss you life good-buy. You will meet veterans by all means, they earn money there, pulling artifacts right out of the 
bum. I heard they talk about Sluggers band, they say they appeared again. As a matter of fact who knows may be they 
were all shot. There's an entrance into the laboratory, but no one returned out of there, so I don't advise to go there... 
May be dwarfs or may be something worse...

ѕодземна€ лаборатори€ мрачное местечко, говор€т что там хран€тс€ документы, открывающие тайны «оны, но скорее всего это просто какой-то документальный хлам. Ћежит он на нижних уровн€х лаборатории, там по слухам целые завалы документов, которые когда-то не успели сжечь. Ќу и конечно здесь обретаютс€ одни из самых мрачных представителей подземелий - бюреры и кровососы... арликов почти никто никогда не видел, говор€т что справитьс€ обычным оружием не получаетс€, пули отскакивают... ¬от, и вроде как кидаютс€ т€желыми булыжниками и металлическими арматурами при помощи странных сил.
It is mysterious place. I wasn't there personaly but they say it's a small town lost in the Zone. Thre are such anomalies \naround it nobody can even approach it.

This is a threshold, military border. Novices walk around there growing roots in the Zone. Behind the village in the cellar 
you find the trader. I advise not butt into the blockpost and stike a soldiers eyes, they have an order to shoot without 
warning. But some of them become kinder as they see money. In general if there's no command they can even let you 
through...when you're lucky. You cannot kill soldiers, only in emergency. For each killed trader must pay and he is not 
happy by that kind of things.

It's a big foul damp after meltdown in 1986 it was filled with piles of radioactive trash-broken crans and machinery. One 
can find old buildings remains. One can meet mutants. Mostly novices walking around here and bandits. You can find 
minor artifacts but it's better not to stay for a long time here. You can reach other interesting places from here. If you go 
to the North you reach the Rostok plant,the passage to the Dark Valley is to the West and to the East is the road to the 
Agroprom institute. You cannot go to the Dark Valley without radiation protection. The dose of radiation there kill you 
during one day.

It is lost army base old village and little lake there. This village is a terrible place. It teems with different monsters there is 
no end to Bloodsuckers only. On the whole stalkers don't butt into it more often walk round. Terrorists from " Freedom" 
grouping settled down on the military base territory. If you go furthe into the Zone find yourself in Red Forest and Brain 
Burner which close the way to Prypyat and APP.

This is the city built long before first meltdown. It wasn't small town, I'd say. It was built specially for the station- the 
place where workers and engineers could live. But now nobody live there of corse, exept vermin like zombie and 
mutants. Though I wasn't there you cannot go there Brain Burner bars the way. That one who is near the Red Forest 
and Antens, have you heard it?

It's terrible place. It is not worth to die there, even when you got deep into the Zone. Those antettas called Brain \nBurner. It is so because everyone who approach it goes crazy and wander after that like restless zombie. It remains only \nhuman covers. It is so long nobody came back out of there, fellow, I don't advise you to butt into there.

It's a gloomy plant I'd say. There are many our people lied down...there's no words. There aare a lot of vermins as if they 
gathered there from the whole Zone. But they say there's something important in this plant, something vitally 
necessary... They butt into it recently because of "Duty" grouping and all died, only cryes could be heard the day long 
int he neighbourhood.

The station who doesn't know about it! It is real heart of the Zone its source. Accordind to legends somewhere in the \nforth energy block situated the thing which can make any of your wishe true. It is called Monolith, may be you've heard \nit? There's so many legends about the station, one can write a book. ChAPP is the main myetery of the Zone.

the legendary Yanter lake, of corse I know! It is dryed out long time ago. It is bad place-death is there. You cannot go 
there- everyone who butt to deep into goes crazy. Zombie-shallows walk around and as they see you run after, so you 
have to flee. Mant stalkers died near this lake, and there are only shallow men wander around... If you manage to walk 
round the lake and zombies you will find scientific camp there. They study something there. They were brought by 
helicopter which regulary delivers provision for them, they digged good in, in general. You can talk to them, they bye 
artifacts and can even give you a mission.

„ерез равные промежутки времени по «оне проход€т волны выброса гравитационного рода в сочетании с резко повышенным психотропным воздействием. ¬о врем€ этой активности, нахождение в «оне смертельно опасно, по всей территории проход€т невидимые волны, человек без спецоборудовани€ гибнет в считанные секунды, начинает тр€стись земл€, затем следует сери€ вспышек. ярко свет€щеес€ небо и черно-белый мир, глаза не выдерживают слеп€щего солнца. ¬о врем€ выброса можно увидеть фантомные образовани€ и марево на местах гравитационных аномалий.

√улкое землетр€сение и вспышки молний освещают черные кип€щие облака. —талкер еле успевает забежать в дом - начинаетс€ выброс. ѕрот€жный подземный удар сотр€сает дом. ѕоднимаетс€ пыль, валитс€ с полок мусор. „ерез разбитое окно комнату освещает вспышка неверо€тно €ркого света. ћир тер€ет цвета и сереет. „ерез открытый дверной проем видна улица и лежащий на асфальте почерневший труп слепого пса. ”раганный ветер несет мусор, начинаетс€ самый т€желый момент выброса. «емл€ встает на дыбы, все заливаетс€ мертвым светом. ѕо€вл€етс€ многоголосый гул и грохот, вспышки молний. Ќа полу тр€сутс€ упавшие вещи. —талкер, забившись в угол, прикрывает слепнущие глаза. » вот наступает пик выброса. ѕроисходит последний, самый сильный и страшный удар. ќн дергает землю, ломает деревь€. Ќа мгновение становитс€ темно, а потом свет и свист, сошедшей с ума «оны, вырубает сознание у сталкера...

Chernobyl zone was illuminated by brightest intolerable light. On the silver because of light sky clouds were evaporating. 
After the instant of full science came rumbling and earth quake. People fell on the groung closing bleeding eyes and ears. 
The shining appeared above huge territory. Everybody who could run saving his life. It looked from the side as if 
enormous deposits of atomic fuel blown up tearing apart APP and neighbourhood. The governmental troops encircled the 
Zone along toward evening. The explosion epicentre is in one kilometer of the APP. Admittedly the whole stuff died in the 
first instants. Many people got into the hitting zone. It was impossible to organize some resque operation on account of 
the electric disturbance which was fataly danger for researchers. In several months after meltdown the crisis situation 
appeared-the Zone proliferated gulfing five kilometers area around it.The most part of governmental troops and 
researchers instantly died. The panic begun. The residents of the neighbour villages and towns were quickly evacuated. 
The whole world was threatened with danger, the scale of which one couldn't even imagine.

It's been two years after dreadfull meltdown happened-the Zone exploded and radioactive clouds covered vast 
territories. Incredible number of died and missed people, dead animals, blackened buildings distorted woods. Thirty 
kilometers of the territory is encircled by the army, scientists can't give any explanations to what was happened. The 
Zone is spreading there weere many anomalies detected in it which cause death-invisible force tears peoples apart, 
injuries badly producing streaming bleedings. Rare expeditions came across mutated animals, which couldn't appear in 
the Zone randomly. Disaster, mutants, contamination is a result of some weird phenomenon...

First expeditions can go deep into the Zone for several kilometers without fatal danger. Amateur researchers, marauders \nand pochers appeared in the Zone. They all were called "stalkers". Stalkers travel along the Zone searching for different \nanomalous formations (artifacts) and get money for it from underground traders.

The accurate date is unknown. Army detachements, headed by military stalkers groups, came as big expedition into the 
Zone. The purpose is to breack through to the epicenter and destroy the reason of the fatal anomalies appearance or at 
least find the reason and results of these actions. At the beginning of the game the last army unit, suppotred by the 
aviation and armoured machinery went deep into. Almost the whole army expedition, in number of ca. 1000 persons 
died, the rest settled down in the Zone territory without any hope for salvation...
